plugin_info.plugin_description: Import timeseries from a water ML XML file
plugin_info.plugin_epilog: Written by Stephen Knox stephen.knox@manchester.ac.uk (c) Copyright 2014, University of Manchester For more information visit www.hydra-network.com

arg.name: timeseriesfile
arg.help: The XML file or folder of XML files containint Water ML timeseries data.

arg.name: datacollectionname
arg.help: The name of the dataset group into which all the timeseries will be put

arg.name: server_url
arg.help: Specify the URL of the server to which this plug-in connects.

arg.name: session_id
arg.help: Specify the session ID for the connection. If not specified, the plugin will try to connect based on the credentials it finds in config
